entry.title: Re @krassenstein @ZubyMusic Comprehensive study in Sweden shows *increased* suicide! Death for sex-reassigned persons was higher than for controls of ...
entry.summary: Re @krassenstein @ZubyMusic Comprehensive study in Sweden shows *increased* suicide! Death for sex-reassigned persons was higher than for controls of same birth sex, particularly death from suicide. They also had increased risk for suicide attempts and psychiatric inpatient care. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3043071/

entry.title: Re @krassenstein @ZubyMusic What research? Every child goes through an identity crisis, but leaping to a permanent solution that sterilizes them for l...
entry.summary: Re @krassenstein @ZubyMusic What research? Every child goes through an identity crisis, but leaping to a permanent solution that sterilizes them for life before they could possibly consent for themselves is wrong. Plain and simple.
